item.title: By: modern bedrooms
item.dc:creator: modern bedrooms
item.description: You could try performing a wall of enormous squares in alternating colors, use vertical panels of color, add lines of horizontal type in a contrasting shade, or go full-scale and paint a mural on an entire wall.
item.content:encoded:
You could try performing a wall of enormous squares in alternating colors, use vertical
panels of color, add lines of horizontal type in a contrasting shade, or go full-scale and paint a mural on an entire wall.

item.title: By: richard krawiec
item.dc:creator: richard krawiec
item.description: Right up front let me say I have worked with some of the individuals at south & eleven on web and book design, so I do have a bias in favor of them. I have always liked their designs - clean, strong, with an understated elegance, and usable. For a writer/editor/publisher this last bit - simplicity of use - is I think one of the most overlooked aspects of design. I like the way these qualities translate here to their site. And this is my first experience with your site. Kudos for making it welcoming, interesting and in its variety thought-provoking for those of us outside the design industry.
item.content:encoded:
Right up front let me say I have worked with some of the individuals at south & eleven on web and book design, so I do have a bias in favor of them. I have always liked their designs – clean, strong, with an understated elegance, and usable. For a writer/editor/publisher this last bit – simplicity of use – is I think one of the most overlooked aspects of design. I like the way these qualities translate here to their site.
And this is my first experience with your site. Kudos for making it welcoming, interesting and in its variety thought-provoking for those of us outside the design industry.
